title.narrative: Rohingya Refugee Crisis Response in Bangladesh 2017-2019 (Operational)

description.narrative: This project will be based in Cox's Bazar as coordination project. The project will focus on providing support to humanitarian main project, which includes: 1. Coordination 2. Staff Salary 3. Administration and logistics 4. Travel and accommodation 5. Monitoring 6. Audit and learning event 7. Staff and partners capacity building 8. Warehouse and other utilities

participating-org.narrative: UN High Commissioner for Refugees UNHCR
UN United Nations Children's Fund UNICEF

mailing-address.narrative: Oxfam House, John Smith Drive, Oxford, OX4 2JY
